sqlMap.insert:
insert into tf_operator_log (opt_seq
staff_id
service_name
opt_result
opt_memo
,opt_time
term_type
opt_term
) values (pb_get_sequences(@in_seq_name:='opt_seq')
#staffId#
#serviceName#
#optResult#
#optMemo#
,NOW()
#termType#
#optTerm#
)
sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from tf_operator_log t where 1=1
FB_GET_DEPT_ID_BY_ID(t.staff_id) in ($staffId2$)
t.SERVICE_NAME in (select distinct d.method from td_menu_info d where d.menu_name like '%$operateLog.serviceName$%')
cast( t.OPT_TIME AS DATE)=cast(#operateLog.optTime# AS DATE)
t.TERM_TYPE like '%$operateLog.termType$%'
t.OPT_TERM like '%$operateLog.optTerm$%'
FB_GET_STAFF_NAME_BY_ID( t.staff_id) like '%$operateLog.staffId$%'
limit $START$ , $END$

select cast(t.OPT_TIME AS CHAR) OPT_TIME, (select distinct d.menu_name from td_menu_info d where d.method = t.service_name ) SERVICE_NAME, (select distinct a.staff_name from tf_operator a where a.staff_id=t.staff_id ) staff_name, FB_GET_DEPT_NAME_BY_ID(t.staff_id) DeptName, t.*,case OPT_RESULT when 1 then '操作成功' else '操作失败' end OPT_RESULTName from tf_operator_log t where 1=1
FB_GET_DEPT_ID_BY_ID(t.staff_id) in ($staffId2$)
t.SERVICE_NAME in (select distinct d.method from td_menu_info d where d.menu_name like '%$operateLog.serviceName$%')
cast( t.OPT_TIME AS DATE)=cast(#operateLog.optTime# AS DATE)
t.TERM_TYPE like '%$operateLog.termType$%'
t.OPT_TERM like '%$operateLog.optTerm$%'
FB_GET_STAFF_NAME_BY_ID( t.staff_id) like '%$operateLog.staffId$%'
order by t.OPT_SEQ desc
limit $START$ , $END$
